## File details

This program was written by Steve Simon on 2020-02-08 with a major revision on 2024-12-29. It is placed in the public domain and you can use this any way you wish.

## Read text file

```{r}
#| label: read-fat
#| echo: true

fat <- read_csv(
  file="../data/fat.csv",
  col_types="nnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnn")
glimpse(fat)
```

```{r input-fd}
fd <- read.table("../data/fat.txt")
names(fd) <- c(
  "case",     "fat_b",  "fat_s", 
  "density",  "age",    "wt", 
  "ht",       "bmi",    "ffw", 
  "neck",     "chest",  "abdomen", 
  "hip",      "thigh",  "knee", 
  "ankle",    "biceps", "forearm", 
  "wrist"
)
```
